Hi Sarah and Sonya, 

Just jumping in here to clear this up. The donations are received by a third-party platform, I believe this is supplied by BlackBaud, which is then embedded on the msaustralia site. Jason Cahill coded and set this up with BlackBaud. He then supplied the code which we then embedded on the website. We have no other access etc. so we can't advise how to fix this I'm afraid. Do you have a contact at BlackBaud that can help as I understand Jason is no longer at MSA?

Changes to Bambora?

Does that make a difference
